issues.title: Merging
issues.body: Currently you have to press `Import`, run `git fetch`, manually merge branch, run `git push`. It would be wonderful if there was one `Merge` button, but then we have to merge changes using JavaScript. I am using my own library, ZeroGit, so feel free to pull-request it [here](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/pull-requests/?18r929Hq8hE5Pi9Zf7ovMQVyn3WcGfxMgu).

issue_comments.body:
Just found this issue when trying to implement some features. Probably some notifications could be added?

Markdown will be added soon.
And you need a new version of ZeroNet because old versions have a vulnerability and a bug which stops Git Center from working.

```javascript
alert(100);
```

**Markdown** works!

`WebSocket` stops working because of bug in ZeroNet as I load a lot of files at once. I asked nofish to fix this.
